title: aria-relevant attribute
description: Indicates what notifications the user agent will trigger when the accessibility tree within a live region is modified. See related aria-relevant.

assertions.title: convey the 'additions' value
examples: Screen readers will announce only additions to the DOM within aria-relevant="additions".

assertions.title: convey the 'removal' value
examples: Screen readers will announce only removals to the DOM within aria-relevant="removals".

assertions.title: convey the 'text' value
examples: Screen readers will announce only text changes to existing nodes within aria-relevant="text".

assertions.title: convey the 'all' value
examples: Screen readers will announce additions, removals, and text changes to within aria-relevant="all".

assertions.title: convey the 'additions text' combination
examples: Screen readers will announce only additions to the DOM and text changes to existing nodes within aria-relevant="additions text".
